title: Information and connection instructions
fullText:
Information and instructions shall be included in the boat owner's manual giving full information on the system of supply, the nominal voltage and frequency of the boat's system and the procedure for carrying out the connection. Information on the phase sequence for three-phase a.c. systems shall also be given for three-phase connections.
NOTE: The information and instructions should include, as a minimum, at least that detailed in Appendix B, Paragraph B1.2.
